hero.title: Operations Simulator
hero.description: Easily calculate all types of operations and scenarios in seconds. Calculate rounds, expansions, sales, convertible notes, etc. It also generates documentation for the simulations in just a few minutes.

topFeatures.title: Main Features
topFeatures.description: Discover the most advanced tools to calculate any type of corporate operation.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: Read testimonials from satisfied clients who use our simulator to improve their operations management.

items.name: Lucía Bouzá
items.description: Sttok allows us to have all the information about partners and incentive plans centralized and updated. It facilitates the management of meetings and the relationship with investors.

items.name: Oriol Miralbell
items.description: Sttok allows you to easily calculate valuations, investment rounds, and simulations. The application interface is simple and intuitive, which allows you to make decisions more quickly and effectively.

items.name: Nacho González
items.description: Now with Sttok you can perform simulations of capital increases or convertible notes. We also easily manage our team's phantom shares. Finally, as an investor, I have my investments organized and I clearly know what I have.

items.name: Johan Longo
items.description: Sttok helps us keep all the information about partners, meetings, and incentive plans of our company organized. It facilitates the management of the cap table and the relationship with investors.
